PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-09322010-07-13JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActCriminal Code
SubjectRegulations Prescribing Certain Offences to be Serious Offences
PrecisREGULATIONS PRESCRIBING CERTAIN OFFENCES TO BE SERIOUS OFFENCES to provide more flexibility in responding to the threats posed by organized crime groups. The Regulations will make a number of criminal offences "serious offences" for the purposes of the organized crime provisions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0161 Publication Date: 2010-08-04
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Prescribing Certain Offences to be Serious Offences
